SELECT ZWBTC.OBJID, ZWBTC.TASK_GUID, ZWBTC.TASK_NO, CASE ZWBTC.CMD_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'O' THEN '出库' ELSE '异常' END CMD_TYPE, ZWBTC.SLOC_NO, ZWBTC.ELOC_NO, ZWBTC.SLOC_PLC_NO, ZWBTC.ELOC_PLC_NO, ZWBTC.CREATION_DATE, ZWBTC.EXCUTE_DATE, ZWBTC.FINISH_DATE, ZWBTC.ERR_NO, ZWBTC.ERR_NAME, ZWBTC.ROUTE_NO, ZWBTC.TRANSFER_NO, ZWBTC.FINISH_STATUS, ZWBTC.PALLET_NO, ZWBTC.ORDER_LINE_GUID, CASE ZWBTC.CMD_STEP WHEN '00' THEN '指令生成' WHEN '01' THEN '指令复位' WHEN '02' THEN '指令下传' WHEN '03' THEN '指令执行' WHEN '04' THEN '指令结束' ELSE '异常' END AS CMD_STEP, ZWBTC.DOWNLOAD_DATE, ZWBTC.PACKAGE_GUID, WPD.MATERIAL_NO, WPD.MATER_SPEC FROM WBS_TASK_CMD ZWBTC LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA WPD ON ZWBTC.PACKAGE_GUID = WPD.PACKAGE_GUID WHERE ZWBTC.TRANSFER_TYPE = 10
ZWBTC.TASK_NO like '%'||#where.TASK_NO#||'%'
ZWBTC.SLOC_PLC_NO like '%'||#where.SLOC_PLC_NO#||'%'
ZWBTC.ELOC_PLC_NO like '%'||#where.ELOC_PLC_NO#||'%'
ZWBTC.PALLET_NO like '%'||#where.PALLET_NO#||'%'
WPD.MATERIAL_NO like '%'||#where.MATERIAL_NO#||'%'
ZWBTC.CREATION_DATE >=#where.BTIME#
ZWBTC.CREATION_DATE <= 1+#where.ETIME#
ORDER BY ZWBTC.OBJID DESC

SELECT ZWBTC.OBJID, ZWBTC.TASK_GUID, ZWBTC.TASK_NO, CASE ZWBTC.CMD_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'O' THEN '出库' ELSE '异常' END CMD_TYPE, ZWBTC.SLOC_NO, ZWBTC.ELOC_NO, ZWBTC.SLOC_PLC_NO, ZWBTC.ELOC_PLC_NO, ZWBTC.CREATION_DATE, ZWBTC.EXCUTE_DATE, ZWBTC.FINISH_DATE, ZWBTC.ERR_NO, ZWBTC.ERR_NAME, ZWBTC.ROUTE_NO, ZWBTC.TRANSFER_NO, ZWBTC.FINISH_STATUS, ZWBTC.PALLET_NO, ZWBTC.ORDER_LINE_GUID, CASE ZWBTC.CMD_STEP WHEN '00' THEN '指令生成' WHEN '01' THEN '指令复位' WHEN '02' THEN '指令下传' WHEN '03' THEN '指令执行' WHEN '04' THEN '指令结束' ELSE '异常' END AS CMD_STEP, ZWBTC.DOWNLOAD_DATE, ZWBTC.PACKAGE_GUID, WPD.MATERIAL_NO, WPD.MATER_SPEC FROM WBS_TASK_CMD ZWBTC LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA WPD ON ZWBTC.PACKAGE_GUID = WPD.PACKAGE_GUID WHERE ZWBTC.TRANSFER_TYPE = 10
(ZWBTC.OBJID = #OBJID#)
